text: Karly () is a rural locality (a village) in Mrakovsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 78 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 28 km from Krasnousolsky, 4 km from Mrakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Karly, Gafuriysky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
